spread¶

spread of excitation

trajectory of contours has 2 formats:
traj [(pz0,cnt0), (pz1,cnt1), ...]
traj_z {pz: [cnt0, cnt1,...], pz+1: [cnt2, cnt3, ...], ...}

Functions

DFS(graph, v, LABEL)

Depth First Search(Traversal) for a graph

area_distr(trajad)

concave_hull(traj)

find concave hull of traj

distance(cnt, cnt2)

distance between two contours

findContours(exc, tRes)

detect contour of blobs; connect overlapping blobs into trajectories

trajinfo(graph, cntdict, polydict, tRes)

spread.findContours(exc, tRes)[source]¶

detect contour of blobs; connect overlapping blobs into trajectories

Returns

dict, each element is a list [(pz,cnt),(pz+1,cnt),…]

spread.distance(cnt, cnt2)[source]¶

distance between two contours

if overlap, distance = 0
otherwise, distance < 0
Parameters

cnt,cnt2 (np.array(int)) – contour of blob in opencv format

Returns

minimum distance between two contours

Return type

float

spread.DFS(graph, v, LABEL)[source]¶

Depth First Search(Traversal) for a graph

Parameters

v – vertex in graph

spread.concave_hull(traj)[source]¶

find concave hull of traj

Returns

shapely.geometry.polygon.Polygon or shapely.geometry.multipolygon.MultiPolygon
